abstract: Tony La Russa plans to see "Moneyball" on the unplanned World Series off-night. Ron Washington has already lived it.
snippet: Tony La Russa plans to see "Moneyball" on the unplanned World Series off-night. Ron Washington has already lived it.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - How to spend a rained-out night off in the World Series? Tony La Russa, the manager of the St. Louis Cardinals, said he planned to see "Moneyball," the movie about Oakland Athletics General Manager Billy Beane.
